column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en |it = codice identificativo CNT |en = CNT-INGV earthquake ID }} === {{Property proposal |status = 4207 |description = {{TranslateThis |it = codice identificativo del terremoto presente sul database del Centro Nazionale Terremoti (CNT) dell'Istituto Nazionale Geofisica e Vulcanologia (INGV) |en = identifier for an earthquake in the Italian National Earthquake Centre database }} |subject item = |infobox parameter = |datatype = external-id |domain = {{Q|7944}} |allowed values = [1-9]\d* |source = http://cnt.rm.ingv.it/ |example = {{Q|Q37730232}} → [http://cnt.rm.ingv.it/event/16796811 16796811] |planned use = |formatter URL = http://cnt.rm.ingv.it/event/$1 |external links = cnt.rm.ingv.it/event/ |see also = |filter = |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = Italian National Earthquake Center ID |topic = event }} ; Motivation Very important source for earthquakes in Italy. Data can be downloaded under CC-BY on http://webservices.ingv.it/fdsnws/event/1/query?eventId=$1&includeallmagnitudes=true&includeallorigins=true&includearrivals=true&includeallstationsmagnitudes=true where $1 is the ID '''★ [[User:Airon90|→ A]][[Special:Contributions/Airon90|ir]][[User talk:Airon90|on 90]]''' 11:19, 22 August 2017 (UTC)
